name: ES-5 Encoder
description: Encodes 12 input channels into a stereo S/PDIF signal suitable for driving the Expert Sleepers ES-5 module, providing 12 additional gate/trigger/clock/sync outputs. Outputs are sample-accurate, primarily on/off but can pass intermediate voltages.

parameters.name: Input bus
parameters.description: Sets the first input bus (1 of 12).

parameters.name: Output bus
parameters.description: Sets the first output bus (1 of 2).

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Enable 0 1 Enables the channel. Input 1 28 Chooses the input bus to convert. Expander
parameters.description: Chooses the expander module – 1 for the ES-5 itself,

parameters.name: or 2-6 for the attached ESX-8GTs. Output
parameters.description: Chooses the output on the selected expander.

parameters.name: Enable 0 1 Enables the channel. Input 1 28 Chooses the input bus to convert. Expander
parameters.description: Chooses the expander module – 1 for the ES-5 itself,

parameters.name: or 2-6 for the attached ESX-8GTs. Output
parameters.description: Chooses the output on the selected expander.
